title: Microsoft has a new team focused on Android and Windows development
content:
Microsoft is reorganizing its internal teams once again, this time to place a heavier emphasis on Android development. The company has formed a new organization called Android Microsoft Platform and Experiences, or AMPX, which will be home to the development of things such as the Surface Duo software, Phone Link (formerly Your Phone), Microsoft Launcher,

The post Microsoft has a new team focused on Android and Windows development appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft is making some changes to its internal teams to bring Android and Windows development closer together and improve interoperability.
